feed.title: GitHub ShaderLab Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of ShaderLab in GitHub

entry.title: ColinLeung-NiloCat/UnityURPUnlitScreenSpaceDecalShader
entry.summary: Unity unlit screen space decal shader for URP. Just create a new material using this shader, then assign it to a new unity cube GameObject = DONE, now you have unlit decal working in URP
